hero.cta: First, I solve the problem. Then, I write the code.

aboutMe.title: Rendering My Story
aboutMe.paragraph1: I got into the world of development after working in other fields, and since then I’ve discovered that programming gives me the freedom to create things from scratch. I’ve always loved technology — I just needed that final push to dive in completely.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I enjoy spending hours coding, learning, and solving problems. I’ve learned that mistakes are part of the process: every bug I’ve fixed has taught me to become a better developer. When something doesn’t work, I don’t stop until it does — and I love that moment when everything finally clicks. I believe that mindset is what drives me to keep growing and improving with every project.
aboutMe.paragraph3: Creating a website is like building a universe: you start from nothing, and line by line, you create something that others can enjoy..

skills.title: My Personal Stack
skills.paragraph: My stack represents the journey I've taken, learning and improving with every line of code. Each tool I use is part of my way of creating, optimizing, and bringing ideas to life.

projects.title: Creating Real Solutions
projects.paragraph: I believe technology makes sense when it improves something real. Every project I develop is born with that idea: to create solutions that connect, simplify, and generate impact.
projects.description1: Human resources management system developed to optimize internal processes, improve communication, and facilitate personnel administration in companies of various sizes.
projects.description2: Full stack sales management system for dealerships, designed to centralize operations, improve cash control, and optimize daily business administration.
projects.description3: Corporate website for a development and design agency, showcasing its services, portfolio, and facilitating contact with potential clients.
projects.description4: Website for a gourmet burger restaurant, focused on displaying its menu, location, and allowing online reservations.
projects.paragraph2: This is just a sample of what I can create. If you want to explore more projects and see what I've been working on lately, visit my

experience.title: My Journey as a Dev
experience.job3: Full Stack Developer with Frontend Focus
experience.description1: Full stack development with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
experience.description2: Customer service, troubleshooting, and support in banking systems.
experience.description3: Intensive 800-hour bootcamp. Full stack development with a frontend focus using Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, among other technologies.
experience.description4: Development, maintenance, and optimization of the web platform, working on both frontend and backend. I implement performance, UX/UI, and functionality improvements, applying best practices and agile methodologies.
experience.description5: Building dockerized RESTful APIs with Docker and Docker Compose, ensuring consistent, scalable, and secure environments. Database optimization, system performance improvement, and seamless integration between frontend and backend.
experience.description6: Studies in Computer Engineering, covering programming fundamentals, data structures, algorithms, databases, and operating systems.
experience.description7: Development of full stack web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js, with implementation of RESTful APIs, management of relational and non-relational databases (PostgreSQL and MongoDB), and application of best practices in architecture and version control.

contact.title: Let's Talk!
contact.paragraph: Web development is not just about code, but about people and collaboration. If you think we could create something together, don't hesitate to reach out.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.success: Thank you for reaching out! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
